references.paper_title: Uncertainty sets for image classifiers using conformal prediction
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of conformal prediction, introducing a method for uncertainty quantification applicable to image classification and providing theoretical underpinnings for the method.

This paper addresses the limitation of conformal prediction by introducing the method to address the challenges of handling non-exchangeable data, extending the applicability of CP to broader applications.

references.paper_title: Conformal prediction for time series with modern hopfield networks
references.reason: This work presents a novel adaptation of conformal prediction to time series data, utilizing the power of modern Hopfield networks to address the challenges posed by temporal dependencies.
This paper extends the applicability of conformal prediction to quantile regression, a crucial development for uncertainty quantification in regression problems.

references.paper_title: Predictive inference with feature conformal prediction
references.reason: This paper explores using conformal prediction within the latent space of a model, improving prediction efficiency by focusing on the most informative semantic features.
